TextView.android:text:
• Detects the language, tone, and intent of incoming messages.
• Translates messages into your preferred language.
• Helps you craft replies with local slang, emojis, and the right tone.
• Suggests expressive GIFs based on intent + vibe.
• Stores your conversation history on-device for offline access.

• All chat content is stored locally using Room database.
• No chat text is uploaded to any server.
• Only short anonymous GIF queries (intent + keywords) are sent to Giphy.
• You can clear all stored history at any time with the Clear History button.
• Speech input is handled by the device speech recognizer; this app does not send audio to its own servers.

• ML Kit: on-device language identification and translation.
• Custom NLP: intent detection, tone detection, slang/idiom styling.
• Room: local, offline chat history.
• Retrofit + Giphy API: GIF search with privacy-safe queries.
• Android SpeechRecognizer: speech-to-text for incoming and reply.
• Floating overlay bubble for quick access while chatting in other apps.
